post_content.heading: False: No Credible Pledge from Trump to Pardon Honduran Ex-President
post_content.body: Claims circulating that Donald Trump has pledged to pardon Juan Orlando Hernandez, the former Honduran president convicted of drug trafficking, are unfounded. There is no credible evidence from reputable news organizations or official statements to support such a promise from Donald Trump. The sources provided alongside this claim are entirely unrelated, discussing topics like Capitol riot participants and asylum claim decisions, offering no relevance or support for the alleged pardon pledge. Juan Orlando Hernandez was indeed convicted in a U.S. court, but reports of a pardon pledge from Trump lack any verifiable basis.
post_content.summary: Donald Trump has not credibly pledged to pardon former Honduran President Juan Orlando Hernandez; reports of such a promise are unsupported by evidence.
